meals.name: Vegetarian Pad Thai with Tofu
meals.description: Classic Thai comfort food - tender tofu, crispy vegetables, and a tangy-sweet sauce over rice noodles. Perfect for introducing diverse flavors.
meals.notes: Use mild sauce for daughter, adjustable spice for adults. Can add chili flakes at the table for extra heat.

meals.name: Vegetable Fried Rice with Tofu
meals.description: A classic comfort meal - fluffy jasmine rice with colorful vegetables, scrambled eggs, and crispy tofu cubes. Kids love the fun colors and texture variety.
meals.notes: Great for using leftover rice. Easy to customize with vegetables on hand. Daughter can help mix the rice!

meals.name: Thai Red Curry Noodle Soup
meals.description: Warming, creamy coconut broth infused with Thai red curry spices, loaded with soft vegetables and rice noodles. A nourishing one-pot meal.
meals.notes: Use mild curry paste for family version. Adults can add more curry paste or sriracha at the table. This is ultimate comfort in a bowl.

meals.name: Shakshuka (Baked Eggs in Tomato Sauce)
meals.description: Middle Eastern classic - fluffy baked eggs nestled in a spiced tomato and vegetable sauce. Colorful, nutritious, and fun for the whole family.
meals.notes: Different from noodles/rice for midweek variety. Daughter loves getting her own egg pocket in the sauce! Can serve with pita bread or crusty bread.

meals.name: Coconut Curry Rice with Chickpeas & Vegetables
meals.description: Golden rice infused with coconut milk and warming spices, loaded with protein-rich chickpeas and tender vegetables. Creamy, satisfying, and deeply nourishing.
meals.notes: Creamy, warming, deeply flavorful soul food. Can make slightly thinner for soup consistency if preferred. Mild version for kids, adults add fresh chili or hot sauce at table.

meals.name: Vegetable & Noodle Stir-Fry
meals.description: Quick and satisfying - colorful vegetables and tender noodles tossed in a light, savory sauce. Great for interactive cooking with the kids.
meals.notes: Fast weeknight meal. All vegetables can be prepped ahead. Interactive - daughter can help toss and mix ingredients. Very adaptable - use any vegetables on hand.

meals.name: Vegetarian Coconut Curry Ramen
meals.description: A soul-warming ramen with creamy coconut curry broth, tender vegetables, and chewy ramen noodles. Perfect for ending the week on a cozy note.
meals.notes: Rich, creamy, deeply satisfying soul food. Build complexity with toppings. Make two broths - mild for kids, spicy for adults by adding chili at the table.

meals.name: Pasta Cacio e Pepe (Roman Cheese & Pepper Pasta)
meals.description: Authentic Roman classic - spaghetti with creamy Pecorino Romano cheese sauce infused with toasted black pepper. No cream needed; the magic is in the emulsion. Sophisticated yet simple.

ingredients.name: Black peppercorns (whole, to be toasted & cracked)

meals.notes: Key is emulsification - temperature control prevents cheese clumping. Buy Pecorino Romano as wedge and grate fresh. Toast peppercorns first for depth.

meals.name: Pasta al Forno (Italian Baked Pasta)
meals.description: Southern Italian Sunday tradition - layers of penne, homemade tomato-vegetable sauce, creamy b√©chamel, and melted cheese, baked until golden. Rich, comforting, impressive.
meals.notes: Can be made ahead - assemble in morning, cover, refrigerate, bake before serving. San Marzano tomatoes are sweeter; worth the investment.

meals.name: Mediterranean Orzo Pasta - Light & Fresh
meals.description: Greek-inspired orzo (rice-shaped pasta) cooked like risotto with warm broth, then finished with fresh vegetables, herbs, and feta cheese. Light yet satisfying, celebrates fresh Mediterranean flavors.
meals.notes: Toasting the orzo is essential for depth. Can serve warm, room temperature, or cold. Celebrates fresh vegetables - use best quality available.

meals.name: Pasta Aglio e Olio (Garlic & Olive Oil Pasta)
meals.description: Mediterranean elegance in simplicity - spaghetti tossed with golden garlic-infused olive oil, fresh parsley, and reserved pasta water. One of Italy's most revered simple dishes.
meals.notes: Golden garlic is the secret - must be soft and golden, not burnt. Olive oil quality is essential - it IS the sauce. Fresh parsley is essential (not basil).

meals.name: Shakshuka (Baked Eggs in Tomato Sauce)
meals.description: Middle Eastern classic - fluffy baked eggs nestled in spiced tomato and vegetable sauce. Colorful, nutritious, fun for whole family. Breaks up the week with non-pasta option.
meals.notes: Serve with crusty bread or pita for dipping. Can be made as brunch or light dinner. Interactive meal - daughter enjoys her own egg pocket.

meals.name: Vegetarian Coconut Curry Ramen
meals.description: Soul-warming ramen with creamy coconut curry broth, tender vegetables, and chewy ramen noodles. Perfect for ending the week on a cozy note. Asian flavors provide contrast to Mediterranean dishes.
meals.notes: Can make two broths - mild for kids, spicy for adults. Build complexity with toppings. Creamy, deeply satisfying broth.

meals.name: Coconut Curry Rice with Chickpeas & Vegetables
meals.description: Golden rice infused with coconut milk and warming spices, loaded with protein-rich chickpeas and tender vegetables. Creamy, satisfying, deeply nourishing.
meals.notes: Blooming the curry powder in oil brings out depth. Can be made slightly thinner for soup consistency if preferred. Warm, deeply nourishing.

shoppingLists.name: Black peppercorns (whole, to be toasted & cracked)
